body.name: GreenForest Computer Desk with 2 Drawers, 50 inch Gaming Desk with LED Lights and Power Outlets, Home Office Desk with Monitor Stand and Storage Shelves, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 35 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: DESK WITH 2 DRAWERS: Reversible computer desk with large storage capacity easily organizes your study and office space which can help you effectively keep your daily necessities in order. Fabric drawers and shelves can be exchanged left and right and moved up and down, you can assemble according to your needs.

GAMING DESK WITH LED LIGHTS: The desk has RGB lights strip. The LED lights with 20 static colors, 22 dynamic modes, 5 brightness adjustable, 10 speed adjustable, you can adjust according to different game scenes, lighting can help you get a richer game experience.

OFFICE DESK WITH CHARGING PORT: The desk includes a built-in 3 Standard Plug outlets and 2 USB charging ports. It is convenient to charge office equipment such as printer, laptops and gaming gear at any time.

COMPUTER DESK WITH MONITOR STAND: The full monitor stand can accommodate two monitors, which can keep your computer at eye-level. This design helps you maintain the right posture for your neck and spinal health.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Desk dimension: 50.3"(L) x 18.8"(W) x 29.5"(H). This desk come with necessary tools and instructions, all parts are clearly labeled. Easy to put together, it will take less time if you have a home drill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy desk
reviews.reviewText: This was an easy desk to put together. Had issues with the LED lights but it was resolved quickly by the seller team. The desk itself is a great addition to my home office. Allows me to work and be creative in one space with nice drawers and shelves and the upper tier of the desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this desk! Mind you I never had a reason to purchase one, but once I started working from home I had to invest in one. The instructions were very clear & understandable. Everything was real simple to put together. All together it took me about an hr 1/2 to complete.Now I have to be honest, the only dislike for me are the drawers. I love the fabric, and how I was able to unfold them, however I wish they were more sturdier.. I wish it had something to hold them in place to keep them from trying to fold back in their previous position. Other than that, it is absolutely great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LED lights do not work
reviews.reviewText: Love the desk sturdy enough for my two monitors but the led lights strip does not work and that is a feature I was truly hoping for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Desk is Literally the Beyoncé of Furniture! 🌟
reviews.reviewText: First off, let's talk drawers. I'm not saying these drawers are magical, but I did find my missing sock in one of them! Two drawers mean double the capacity. Now, let's address the LED lights. My desk is basically a disco ball now. Turning those lights on makes me feel like I'm at a party, and my keyboard is dropping some sick beats. Can your desk do that? Doubt it. And guess what? Power outlets! My desk has more power outlets than my last relationship had issues. Charging my gadgets is now easier than ordering a pizza. No more reaching under the table like a treasure hunter – just plug and play! The gaming vibes are off the charts. The monitor stand is like a DJ booth for my screen, and the shelves? Perfect for storing snacks, because gaming without snacks is like a burger without cheese – unacceptable.In conclusion, my GreenForest desk is not just a desk; it's a lifestyle. It's the superhero of furniture, saving the day with drawers, lights, and outlets. If desks were celebrities, this one would be Beyoncé – iconic, flawless, and a game-changer. Don't miss out on the desk of your dreams, y'all! 🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No directions or Manual
reviews.reviewText: If you have 10 hours to break your head buy it!!! There was no directions or manual.Update: company send me a manual and you can also find it online. I’m happy they contacted me and offer me a solution. I would definitely give them another try

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this computer desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk was super easy to assemble and instructions were simple to follow and came with everything needed to complete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This beautiful, modern desk is an absolute win for the new year!! I love it so much it is better quality than some of those lower quality cheap desk. It feels heavy, weighted and nice. It’s easy to build, but definitely take a couple hours or so out of your day. It’s a time consuming if you’re doing it but it’s extremely easy it’s just a lot of screws to put in, other than that I can’t say anything bad about it I love it the drawers work beautifully. I decided to put my two drawers at the top and the two shelves at the bottom you can play around with it however you like I’m a symmetry person, so that’s why I did that and I love it. You can see the pictures and videos just how beautiful this is for the LED light strips the tape on the back I was not able to get off so I just use transparent tape to hold it in place for an hour until I get some better tape. i’m extremely happy with my purchase. I love the modern clean look.

reviews.reviewText: Appearance style: good-looking, elegant and simpleProduct quality: good quality, very stableFeeling of use: highly ergonomicThe texture of the flat wooden board is very good, the color is correct, the installation is simple and quick, the instructions are simple, follow the pictures to install
